name: NOMINAL (itch)
description:
Fly through the heavens and complete wacky quests.  With no engines, your ship is forced to use gravity to navigate!

Made in 1 week.

Controls
Space to change orbit
Shift to turn around
Escape to view quest log

Credits
Art and music - Cheeky Lions
Programming - Mazzymon

This game is inspired by My Famicase Exhibition 2018
